trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows text box control.
With the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, the user can enter text in an application.
trans-unit.target: 与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件，用户可以在应用程序中输入文本。

trans-unit.source: This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing and password character masking.
trans-unit.target: 此控件具有标准 Windows 文本框控件，包括多行编辑和密码字符屏蔽中找不到的其他功能。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is used to display, or accept as input, a single line of text.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件用于显示，或者接受作为输入，单个文本行。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> properties to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>属性，以启用要输入或显示的文本的多个行。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> properties to `true` to enable greater text manipulation in a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>属性设置为`true`以启用更高版本中为多行的文本操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property to `true` to adjust the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>属性`true`调整高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the height by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置调整高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the amount of text entered into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to a specific number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 你可以限制的文本输入到量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>到特定数量的字符的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls can also be used to accept passwords and other sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> 控件还可以用来接受密码和其他敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property to mask characters entered in a single-line version of the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>属性设置为单线条版本的控件中输入掩码字符。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to enable the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>属性，使用户能够仅键入大写形式，并仅大小写或到大写和小写字符的组合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: To scroll the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> until the cursor (caret) is within the visible region of the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 窗口的内容滚动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>之前光标 （脱字号） 控件的可见区域内，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To select a range of text in the text box, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在文本框中选择一个文本范围，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To restrict text from being entered in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event in order to validate each character entered in the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要从输入中限制文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件，你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>若要验证输入控件中的每个字符的事件。

trans-unit.source: You can also restrict all entry of data in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以限制中的数据的所有条目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Most of the functionality of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 大多数功能的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>类。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with visual styles enabled will cause the incorrect handling of surrogate fonts.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>启用了视觉样式的控件将导致代理项字体的不正确处理。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>带垂直滚动条的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> class.
The parent container control defines the color and font settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 父容器控件定义的颜色和字体设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control and assigns a string to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制并将字符串分配给控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.
<see langword="true" /> if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; <see langword="false" /> if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 ENTER 键在控件; 的多行版本中创建新的一行文本<see langword="false" />如果 ENTER 键即可激活窗体的默认按钮。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是`false`，用户必须按 CTRL + ENTER 以在多行中创建一个新行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: If there is no default button for the form, the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, regardless of the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有窗体的默认按钮，ENTER 键将总是在控件中，而不考虑此属性的值创建新的一行文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>带垂直滚动条的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> to use when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource" /> property is set to <see langword="CustomSource" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> to use with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个与 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource" /> 一起使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性以创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，通过比较输入于维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀的前缀来自动完成输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>在其中 Url、 地址、 文件名称或命令将经常输入的控件。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>属性是可选的但您必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性`CustomSource`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统可能会限制可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数量。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将集合的自动完成自定义源用作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example does the following:
trans-unit.target: 此示例将执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性来启用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件能够接受其自动完成行为的自定义源。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property to set the custom list of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>属性设置的值的自定义列表。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>属性来设置自动完成候选项的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an option that controls how automatic completion works for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" />.
One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" /> 的值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following are the values.
trans-unit.target: 下面是值。

trans-unit.source: Appends the remainder of the most likely candidate string to the existing characters, highlighting the appended characters.
trans-unit.target: 将最可能的候选字符串的其余部分追加到现有的字符，突出显示的追加的字符。

trans-unit.source: Displays the auxiliary drop-down list associated with the edit control.
trans-unit.target: 显示与编辑控件关联的辅助下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: This drop-down is populated with one or more suggested completion strings.
trans-unit.target: 此下拉列表中填充了一个或多个建议的完成字符串。

trans-unit.source: Appends both <see langword="Suggest" /> and <see langword="Append" /> options.
trans-unit.target: 追加<see langword="Suggest" />和<see langword="Append" />选项。

trans-unit.source: Disables automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: 禁用自动完成。

trans-unit.source: This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认设置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性以创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，通过比较输入于维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀的前缀来自动完成输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>在其中 Url、 地址、 文件名称或命令将经常输入的控件。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>属性是可选的但您必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性`CustomSource`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统可能会限制可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数量。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将集合的自动完成自定义源用作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example does the following:
trans-unit.target: 此示例将执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性来启用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件能够接受其自动完成行为的自定义源。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property to set the custom list of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>属性设置的值的自定义列表。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>属性来设置自动完成候选项的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" />.
Gets or sets a value specifying the source of complete strings used for automatic completion.
One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" /> 的值之一。

trans-unit.source: The options are <see langword="AllSystemSources" />, <see langword="AllUrl" />, <see langword="FileSystem" />, <see langword="HistoryList" />, <see langword="RecentlyUsedList" />, <see langword="CustomSource" />, and <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 这些选项为 <see langword="AllSystemSources" />、<see langword="AllUrl" />、<see langword="FileSystem" />、<see langword="HistoryList" />、<see langword="RecentlyUsedList" />、<see langword="CustomSource" /> 和 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性以创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，通过比较输入于维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀的前缀来自动完成输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>在其中 Url、 地址、 文件名称或命令将经常输入的控件。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>属性是可选的但您必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性`CustomSource`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> 不能在多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that can be displayed at once.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统可能会限制可以在一次显示的自定义字符串的数量。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将集合的自动完成自定义源用作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example does the following:
trans-unit.target: 此示例将执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>属性来启用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件能够接受其自动完成行为的自定义源。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property to set the custom list of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>属性设置的值的自定义列表。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>属性来设置自动完成候选项的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" />.
Gets or sets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control modifies the case of characters as they are typed.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing" /> enumeration values that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control modifies the case of characters.
trans-unit.target: 之一<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing" />枚举值，指定是否<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" />控件修改字符的大小写。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="CharacterCasing.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="CharacterCasing.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change the case of characters as required by your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>属性可以更改为按你的应用程序所需的字符的大小写。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could change the case of all characters entered in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control used for password entry to uppercase or lowercase to enforce a policy for passwords.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您无法更改输入中的所有字符的大小写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件，用于输入密码用于大写或小写，以强制实施密码策略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that is used to accept a password.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>用于接受密码的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to restrict the password length to eight characters.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>属性以更改到类型化的所有字符小写，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>属性将密码长度限制为八个字符。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property to center the password in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>属性到中心中的密码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含创建控件的句柄时所需的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请注意不要引用在以前调用之前释放对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: One of the key's values.
Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified key is an input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.IsInputKey%2A> method returns `true` when `keyData` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Return> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.IsInputKey%2A>方法返回`true`时`keyData`包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Return>值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
<see langword="true" /> if the control is a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果控件为多行<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" />控件的指针; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> 不能在多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the font is changed, any indentation that you have defined does not appear.
trans-unit.target: 字体更改时，不显示任何已定义的缩进。

trans-unit.source: To get indentation, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> to `true` and override WM_SETFONT without calling the base class so that SETMARGINS is not called.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取缩进，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>到`true`并重写而不会调用基类，以便不调用 SETMARGINS WM_SETFONT。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>带垂直滚动条的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnFontChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnFontChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus" /> event.
When the user selects text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, the control saves the selection.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择中的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件，控件将保存所选内容。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control gets focus, the selection is the same as when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件获得焦点时，所选内容等同于时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>失去焦点。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> gets focus for the first time, the entire text is selected.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>获得焦点时第一次，选定的整个文本。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnGotFocus%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnGotFocus%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> event.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleDestroyed(System.EventArgs)" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnHandleDestroyed%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnHandleDestroyed%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnHandleDestroyed(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnHandleDestroyed(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnHandleDestroyed(System.EventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnHandleDestroyed(System.EventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnTextAlignChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnTextAlignChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnTextAlignChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnTextAlignChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnTextAlignChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnTextAlignChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character used to mask characters of a password in a single-line <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
The character used to mask characters entered in a single-line <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用到的单行中输入掩码字符的字符<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" />控件。

trans-unit.source: Set the value of this property to 0 (character value) if you do not want the control to mask characters as they are typed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不希望对掩码字符的控制，输入时，此属性的值设置为 0 （字符值）。

trans-unit.source: Equals 0 (character value) by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下等于 0 （字符值）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> property has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>属性的优先级高于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 每当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>设置为`true`、 使用默认系统的密码字符和任何字符集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property is set, cut and copy actions in the control using the keyboard cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>属性设置，则无法执行使用键盘控件中的剪切和复制操作。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>处于密码模式，因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>处于受限模式。

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>被禁用，但是当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>进行缓存以便它可以还原如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>变为不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: 切换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>是一个常用方案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>控件处于受限模式中被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: 从设计器的角度看，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>显示值是实际值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that is used to accept a password.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>用于接受密码的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change all characters typed to lowercase and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to restrict the password length to eight characters.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>属性以更改所有字符类型化为小写和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>属性将密码长度限制为八个字符。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property to center the password in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>属性到中心中的密码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The text to replace.
Sets the selected text to the specified text without clearing the undo buffer.
Unlike setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Paste%2A> does not affect the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 与设置不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Paste%2A>不会影响剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference that represents the window message to process.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the shortcut key to process.
Processes a command key.
<see langword="true" /> if the command key was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
New in 4.6.1.
trans-unit.target: 4.6.1 中的新增功能。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, the Ctrl-A shortcut key in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> failed to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties were both set to `true.`.
trans-unit.target: 在以前版本中的 Ctrl A 快捷键<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>无法选择所有文本时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>属性均设置为`true.`。

trans-unit.source: This method enables the Ctrl-A shortcut key to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties are both set to `true.`
trans-unit.target: 此方法使 Ctrl A 快捷键以选择所有文本时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>属性都设置为 `true.`

trans-unit.source: Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.0 through 4.6 can take advantage of this method by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file:
trans-unit.target: 面向.NET Framework 版本 4.0 到 4.6 应用程序可以充分利用此方法，通过添加以下`<runtime>`app.config 文件的部分：

trans-unit.source: Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.6.1 or newer can opt out of this behavior by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file:
trans-unit.target: 面向.NET framework 4.6.1 或更高版本可以应用程序选择退出此行为将添加到以下`<runtime>`app.config 文件的部分：

trans-unit.source: If the app.config file already contains an `AppContextSwitchOverrides` key, merge the new key value into the existing key.
trans-unit.target: 如果 app.config 文件已包含`AppContextSwitchOverrides`密钥，将新的密钥值合并到现有的密钥。

trans-unit.source: For example, `<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`.
trans-unit.target: 例如 `<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作与非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which scroll bars should appear in a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.

One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> enumeration values that indicates whether a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control appears with no scroll bars, a horizontal scroll bar, a vertical scroll bar, or both.
trans-unit.target: 之一<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" />枚举值，该值指示是否为多行<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" />控件的外观与任何滚动条，水平滚动条、 垂直滚动条，和 / 或。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="ScrollBars.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="ScrollBars.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property is set to `true`, regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 不会显示水平滚动条如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>属性设置为`true`，而不考虑的值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>带垂直滚动条的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> properties to make the multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>属性以使多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件可用于创建文本文档。

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 与该控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how text is aligned in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> enumeration values that specifies how text is aligned in the control.
trans-unit.target: 之一<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" />指定文本控件中的对齐方式的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="HorizontalAlignment.Left" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="HorizontalAlignment.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to match the layout of text on your form.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性中对齐文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>以匹配窗体上的文本的布局。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your controls are all located on the right side of the form, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A> property to `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, and the text will be aligned with the right side of the control instead of the default left alignment.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你的控件位于窗体右侧上，你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A>属性`HorizontalAlignment.Right`，并且将与控件而不是默认左对齐方式的右侧对齐文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that is used to accept a password.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>用于接受密码的控件。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to restrict the password length to eight characters.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>属性以更改到类型化的所有字符小写，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>属性将密码长度限制为八个字符。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property to center the password in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>属性到中心中的密码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign" /> property has changed.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you find out when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报表有助于您了解发生的事件，并可以帮助您进行调试时。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> named `TextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>名为`TextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control should appear as the default password character.
<see langword="true" /> if the text in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control should appear as the default password character; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果中的文本<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" />控件应显示为默认密码字符; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> property has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>属性的优先级高于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 每当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>设置为`true`、 使用默认系统的密码字符和任何字符集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>处于密码模式，因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>处于受限模式。

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>被禁用，但是当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>进行缓存以便它可以还原如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>变为不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: 切换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>是一个常用方案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>控件处于受限模式中被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: 从设计器的角度看，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>显示值是实际值。

trans-unit.source: A Windows Message object.
Processes Windows messages.
